ergmito 0.1.0
  • Reference

Processing formulas in ergmito

ergmito_formulae.Rd

The ERGMitos R package allows estimating pooled ERGMs by aggregating independent networks together.

ergmito_formulae(model, gattr_model = NULL, target.stats = NULL,
  stats = NULL, env = parent.frame(), ...)

Arguments

model

A formula. The left-hand-side can be either a small network, or a list of networks.
gattr_model

A formula. Model especification for graph attributes. This is useful when using multiple networks.
target.stats

Observed statistics. If multiple networks, then a list, otherwise a named vector (see ergm::summary_formula).
stats

A list.
env

Environment in which model should be evaluated.
...

Further arguments passed to ergm::ergm.allstats.

Value

A list of class ergmito_loglik.

  • loglik A function. The log-likelihood function.

  • grad A function. The gradient of the model.

  • stats If the number of networks is greater than 1, then a list of objects as returned by ergm::ergm.allstats (one per network). Otherwise, a single list returned by the same function.

  • model A formula. The model passed.

  • npars Integer. Number of parameters.

  • nnets Integer. Number of networks to estiamte.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
